titles.title: Isekai Trip-saki de Tasukete Kureta no wa, Hitogoroshi no Shounen deshita.
異世界トリップ先で助けてくれたのは、 人殺しの少年でした。
The Man Who Saved Me on My Isekai Trip Is a Killer...

title: Isekai Trip-saki de Tasukete Kureta no wa, Hitogoroshi no Shounen deshita.
title_english: The Man Who Saved Me on My Isekai Trip Is a Killer...
title_japanese: 異世界トリップ先で助けてくれたのは、 人殺しの少年でした。
synopsis:
One day Megumi got transported to another world. She swiftly found herself assaulted by bandits, but a young man came to her rescue. She quickly became infatuated with him, and the two started a sexual relationship. She doesn't know anything about this world, and nobody explained the rules to her... But she believes that her savior will protect her.

But what does he want? He seems to be after something he seems to be using her to make something happen... However, Megumi has no idea. And that's how her new life begins.

(Source: DLsite)
background: Isekai Trip-saki de Tasukete Kureta no wa, Hitogoroshi no Shounen deshita. was originally released as a web comic on DLsite from November 3, 2020 to May 28, 2022. An official version of the series was published by Ichijinsha on December 28, 2022. The web comic version of the series was released digitally in English by DLsite as The Man Who Saved Me on My Isekai Trip Is a Killer... from June 17, 2021 to June 10, 2022.
